tool.name: summarize taxa through plots
tool.description: A workflow script for performing taxonomy summaries and plots
tool.command:
summarize_taxa_through_plots.py -i $otu_table_fp -o summarize_taxa_through_plots_output
#if str($charts)=="yes": -o $output_dirBar.files_path #else: -o $output_dirArea.files_path #end if
#if str($parameter_fp) != 'None': -p $parameter_fp #end if
#if str($mapping_fp) != 'None': -m $mapping_fp #end if
#if str($mapping_category): -c $mapping_category #end if
#if $sort: -s #end if ;
#if str($charts)=="yes": mv $output_dirBar.files_path/taxa_summary_plots/* $output_dirBar.files_path/ #else: mv $output_dirArea.files_path/taxa_summary_plots/* $output_dirArea.files_path/ #end if

param.label: -p/--parameter_fp: path to the parameter file, which specifies changes to the default behavior. See http://www.qiime.org/documentation/file_formats.html#qiime-parameters. [if omitted, default values will be used]
param.name: parameter_fp

param.label: -m/--mapping_fp: path to the mapping file [REQUIRED if passing -c]
param.name: mapping_fp

param.label: Choose the output type of charts : BarChart or AreaChart
param.name: charts

param.label: -c/--mapping_category: Summarize OTU table using this category. [default: None]
param.name: mapping_category

tool.help: The steps performed by this script are: Summarize OTU by Category (optional, pass -c); Summarize Taxonomy; and Plot Taxonomy Summary The results of this script is a folder (specified by -o) containing taxonomy summary files (at different levels) and a folder containing taxonomy summary plots. Additionally, if a mapping_catgory is supplied there will be a summarized OTU table. The primary interface for this output are the OUTPUT_DIR/taxa_summary_plots/\*html files which are interactive plots that can be opened in a web browser (see the mouse-overs for interactivity).
